p: Oral pathogenic microorganisms such as Escherichia coli, Bacillus sp., Staphylococcus aureus, Staphylococcus epidermidis, Micrococcus luteus, Streptococcus mutans, Streptococcus pyogenes, Lactobacillus acidophilus, Candida albicans were collected from Dental Department, Ondo State Specialist Hospital, Akure, while typed cultures viz; S. aureus (ATCC 29213), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (ATCC 27853), E. coli (ATCC 35218) and Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) were obtained from Medical Microbiology Department, University College Hospital, Ibadan.
